about.details:
Incorporated in 1995, Innovative tyres & tubes ltd manufactures and sells bias tires in India. The company offers tires for motorcycles, scooters, three-wheelers, passenger vehicles, light-trucks, trucks, buses, and special purpose vehicles as well as tubes. They sell their products under the brand "Innovative".

Innovative's product range covers all highway sizes, Off The Road (OTR) highway sizes, agriculture and industrial tyres. They serves original equipment manufacturers. The company also exports its products to the Philippines, the United Arab Emirates, Peru, Latin America, etc.

Company's plant is located at Halol, in Gujarat. ITTL has strong business relationship with tyre major Ceat Ltd. Company is manufacturing all segments of Nylon Tyres. Company is catering to domestic markets/after sales market, OEMs and is also exporting its products.

contactDetails.full_address: Innovative Tyres & Tubes Ltd, 1201 1202, 1203 –, GIDC Halol

faqs.question: What is the Innovative Tyres IPO?
faqs.answer:
Innovative Tyres IPO is a SME IPO of 6297000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹28.34 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹45 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 22, 2017, and closes on September 26, 2017.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Innovative Tyres IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Innovative Tyres IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Innovative Tyres IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Innovative Tyres IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Innovative Tyres IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Innovative Tyres IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Innovative Tyres IPO opens on September 22, 2017 and closes on September 26, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Innovative Tyres IPO?
faqs.answer: Innovative Tyres IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,35,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Innovative Tyres IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Innovative Tyres IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
